name: Plastic (Tom Wright)
description:
Use WSAD  to move. Press space to jump. Use the mouse to look around. Click in the viewport to hide the cursor. Press escape to un-hide it.

-----------------------------------------------------

Worldwide, between 4.8 and 12.7 million tonnes of plastic enter the ocean each year, contaminating marine ecosystems and harming aquatic wildlife.  In this simulation game, press enter to teleport two alternate universes: a world where plastic pollution is brought under control, and one where it is not...
